title: Did Brett Cavanaugh ever try a case before being promoted from a law clerk to a federal judge?
subtitle: Cavanaugh did not spend much time in the courtrooms when President George W. Bush nominated him to the D.C. District in 2003, but had other legal experience.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: When President George W. Bush nominated him to the Capital District in 2003, Brett Cavanaugh never tried a case in court and was promoted from law clerk to judge.
